sentences.en: Decor and service excellence the asking price is quite expensive.
sentences.cn: 装潢和服务精益求精,要价也颇为不菲.

sentences.en: Excuse me, I just wanted to compliment you on the stunning decor.
sentences.cn: 不好意思?我只想赞美一下你那了不起的装饰布置.

sentences.en: Glass and Glassware Wire , Nautial, Metal, Glassware, Resin, Wall Decor, Xmas.
sentences.cn: 采购产品玻璃和玻璃器具类, 电线, 金属, 玻璃器具类, 树脂, 墙壁装饰, 圣诞节.

sentences.en: The decor has a cool sophistication.
sentences.cn: 这种装潢设计很是复杂精细.

sentences.en: The decor includes furniture of natural woods or bleached oaks.
sentences.cn: 装饰物包括:用天然木料或漂白过的橡木制成的家具.

sentences.en: The decor is a mix of antique and modern.
sentences.cn: 装修风格是古今合璧。 decorate 装修；装饰

sentences.en: The decor is simple—black lacquer panels on white walls.
sentences.cn: 装潢风格非常简单——白色墙上镶着漆成黑色的裙板。

sentences.en: The decor is tasteful and restrained.
The decor was reminiscent of a municipal arts-and-leisure centre.
sentences.cn: 这种布置让人想起都市里的艺术休闲中心。

sentences.en: The house has a high standard of luxury furnishing and decor.
sentences.cn: 这所房子的装饰和配置非常奢华.

sentences.en: The oil painting tones in nicely with the general decor.
sentences.cn: 这幅油画与室内的总装饰非常协调.

sentences.en: The quiet decor of her home made her feel comfortable and at ease.
sentences.cn: 她家里淡雅的装饰使她感到舒适.
餐馆内部别致的新装潢

sentences.en: The room's decor is bright, modern and very well presented.
sentences.cn: 房间的装饰非常明亮, 充满现代气息,而且布置很得体.

sentences.en: We specialize in luxury decor that is both upscale and unique.
sentences.cn: 我们专门从事开发华贵家居饰品,她高端,独特.

words.tran_cn: 装饰，修饰（decorate的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 布置，装饰，布景，装饰风格
trans.tran_en: the way that the inside of a building is decorated
